definition: to take part in/to participate/to join/to attend/to counsel/unequal/varied/irregular/uneven/not uniform/abbr. for 參議院|参议院 Senate, Upper House

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: The text is a sane conversation with millions of participants.
sentences.chinese: 文本是一次與無數參與者的理智交談。

sentences.english: All participants were given a series of questions about the true self.
sentences.chinese: 所有參與者都要回答有關真實的自我的一系列問題。

sentences.english: The Slow Year Movement is becoming increasingly popular.
sentences.chinese: “慢活運動”正在全球吸引越來越多的參與者。

sentences.english: Women, for instance, make up only 13% of contributors.
sentences.chinese: 再比方說女性在參與者中，僅佔了13%的比例。

sentences.english: And what do those visiting Karneval dress up as? Everything imaginable.
sentences.chinese: 看看這些科隆狂歡節參與者的打扮，發揮你的想象吧。

sentences.english: Informed consent should not be a mere contract for research participants to sign.
sentences.chinese: 知情同意不應該僅僅是一個讓研究參與者簽署的合同。

sentences.english: The results of this study showed that most participants reacted favorably to Shadowing.
sentences.chinese: 研究成果顯示大多數的研究參與者對跟述持正向反應。

sentences.english: Others become involved as donors of backyard fruit.
sentences.chinese: 另一些參與者作爲自產水果捐獻者。

sentences.english: Twelve trials with a total of 724 participants were included in the review.
sentences.chinese: 一共納入十二組試驗的724位參與者。

sentences.english: Most often, the pattern is implemented for actors in the initiator or facilitator role.
sentences.chinese: 它更多是爲了啓動器或代理角色的參與者而被實現。

sentences.english: The connections and protocols that show how these participants interact to do so.
sentences.chinese: 表示這些參與者如何相互作用的連接和協議同樣如此。

sentences.english: Each of these participants provides services and realizes capabilities according to the service interface.
sentences.chinese: 每一個參與者都根據服務界面來提供服務並實現功能。

sentences.english: Think of a use case as results-oriented from the actor's point of view.
sentences.chinese: 將一個用例看作是來自參與者觀點導向的結果。

sentences.english: More importantly, I have been a warmhearted participant of volunteer activities.
sentences.chinese: 更重要的是，我還是志願者活動的一個熱心的參與者。

sentences.english: MAR is a participant in the national whale disentanglement network.
sentences.chinese: 三月是一個在全國鯨魚退糾纏網絡參與者。

sentences.english: One contributor suggested redefining the concept of the bookmobile in urban areas.
sentences.chinese: 某位討論參與者建議重新定義城區流動圖書館的概念。

definition: to pass through/to penetrate/by means of/via
to advance/to conduct/underway/in progress/to do/to carry out/to carry on/to execute
by means of/through/via/to pass through/to get through/to adopt/to pass (a bill or inspection etc)/to switch over
student/member of an institution of learning/officer cadet
auxiliary verb introducing future action: may (be able to)/will (cause)/should (enable)/going to
